answerText: Gigi[10] Another novel by Colette focuses on a love triangle between Camille Malmert, her husband Alain Amparat, and one of these animals, another of which drowns in a barrel of water in a satiric novel by Natsume Soseki.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Virginia + Dartmouth | 6 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The title character of this novel is supervised by Madame Alvarez, who laments her daughter Andree's decision to become a performer in second-rate musicals. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel by Colette about a girl who rejects, then agrees to, Aunt Alicia's plan to marry her to the rich Gaston Lachaille. It was made into a Lerner and Loewe film with the same title.
